values.text: I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding.
I didn't get your meaning.

generic.title: Is your card lost or damaged?
You have 2 open service requests. May I know which one you want details about?

values.text:
The current credit limit of $credit_card is $$credit_limit_silver. 
How much would you want to increase the credit limit?
Are you refering to your debit card or credit card?

generic.title: Sure, I can help you with that. Which credit card would you like to increase the credit limit on?
What would you like to do?

values: What address do you want your new card sent to?

values.text:
Sure, I can help you with that. Here are the service request(s) you have logged  with us:

SR 132 : Debit Card Stuck in ATM 
SR 148 : Credit Card Lost
SR 269:  Increase of Credit Limit
Thank you for using DTE Bank Virtual Assist. Have a nice day!
Your card will be blocked upon submission of this request.

generic.title: Please select one of the card(s) below that you wish to block:

values.text: Your account balance is $$account_balance.
Let me check on your credit card limits...
The credit limit of your credit cards are listed below:
ABC Bank Platinum: $$credit_limit_platinum
The bank is open 9am to 5pm Monday through Friday
Your current $product has been cancelled. Your new card will be sent to $street_address.
Is there anything else I can assist you with?

generic.title: What would you like to check?

values: Credit limit for Credit Cards with ABC Bank is up to 4 times of your monthly income, subject to bank's approval.
